title: Kotlin Coroutines and Structured Concurrency
summary: Let's dive into how understanding structured concurrency is key to understanding Kotlin coroutines and scope.
long_summary: Kotlin handles concurrent programming using a paradigm called structured concurrency and a mechanism called coroutines. To me, these things felt very different from other languages, so I want to talk about how understanding structured concurrency helped me know how to write Kotlin coroutines.
